Services

Liqa is an Ethiopian software development business that collaborates with forward-thinking individuals and organizations all over the world, providing them with top-notch design, specialized programming, and software that is focused on results.

Website Development

Liqa Technologies in Addis Abeba, Ethiopia, creates dynamic and responsive websites with a quick turn-around time, best quality, and affordable pricing. With the help of our efficient web development services, Liqa Technologies enables you to create successful and high-performing websites.

Android Development

Liqa Technologies in Addis Abeba, Ethiopia, creates reliable Android applications employing clean design (MVVM architecture), a test-driven methodology, and features like maps integration, video playback, real-time communication, on-device caching, notifications, attractive UI, user-friendly UX, content encryptions, and industry standard Application security.

IOS Development

Liqa Technologies in Addis Abeba, Ethiopia builds iOS applications using React native and a clean architecture (MVVM architecture.) By merging appealing UI, user-friendly UX, and industry-standard patterns, we were able to handle a variety of capabilities.

API Development

Liqa Technologies in Addis Abeba, Ethiopia, uses industry-standard server frameworks as the foundation of our backend service to provide secure, quick, and scalable restful backend services for our dependable applications. These frameworks include NodeJS, ExpressJS, Google's Firebase, and many more.

Liqa technologies is a software development company based in Addis Abeba, Ethiopia, with a focus on Web development, mobile development, and API design and development.
